Listen while fighting!!\""},{"lineNumber":25598,"originalJapaneseLine":"自らも戦斧を振るって血戦しながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"While wielding his battle axe in fierce combat himself,"},{"lineNumber":25599,"originalJapaneseLine":"コルドバは周囲を圧する胴間声で叫びを上げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Cordoba shouted in a commanding voice that overpowered those around him."},{"lineNumber":25600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日だ！　今日だけ、持ちこたえろ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Today! Just today, hold on!"},{"lineNumber":25601,"originalJapaneseLine":"　夜が明ければ、援軍がやってくる！","translatedEnglishLine":"At dawn, reinforcements will arrive!"},{"lineNumber":25602,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺たちの勝ちだ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We will win!!\""},{"lineNumber":25603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「生き残るだけで勲章ものだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just surviving is worthy of a medal!"},{"lineNumber":25604,"originalJapaneseLine":"　家族にたっぷり自慢できるぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You can boast plenty to your families!\""},{"lineNumber":25605,"originalJapaneseLine":"希望の歓声が上がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"A cheer of hope rose."},{"lineNumber":25606,"originalJapaneseLine":"青の将・コルドバ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Blue General Cordoba."},{"lineNumber":25607,"originalJapaneseLine":"防衛戦ではリーザス一を誇る鉄壁の将は、","translatedEnglishLine":"The ironclad general who boasts the best defense in Leazas,"},{"lineNumber":25608,"originalJapaneseLine":"要所を守るのに極めて重要な、士気の上げ方を","translatedEnglishLine":"knew better than anyone the importance of raising morale to defend key points."},{"lineNumber":25609,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰よりも心得ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"He was more knowledgeable than anyone in that."},{"lineNumber":25610,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ……こ、こいつら……しつこい……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... th-they're persistent...!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、いいわ。ご苦労さま」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it's fine. Thank you for your efforts."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれは使徒ですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is an Apostle, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最近、要人の暗殺未遂が多発していますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lately, there have been many assassination attempts on important figures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒まで来るとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and for an Apostle to come here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「向こうも本気、ですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They're serious, too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一層用心します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will be even more cautious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、マリス。この娘、余裕があったら直しといて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Maris. If you have time, fix this girl up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアはそう言って、鏡の破片になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lia said that, pointing to the shadow clone shattered into pieces of a mirror.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 影武者を指さした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She pointed at the shadow clone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「方法を調べておきます。……レイラ隊長？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll investigate the method... Captain Layla?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええと、確か……まず、破片を全部集めて…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, if I remember correctly... first, collect all the fragments..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……しかし、ここまで入り込まれる時点で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (…But for them to get this far inside,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 良くないわよね。……ちょっと不利、かな……？）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's not good... we're at a slight disadvantage, aren't we...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは、まだまだ始まったばかりだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle had only just begun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カーソンより、南に半日あまり。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A little more than half a day's travel south of Carson.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに、ニクラス砦という小さな古びた砦があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was a small, old fort called Fort Niklas here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 設備は旧式、規模も小さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The facilities were outdated and the scale was small.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王都にほど近いせいもあり前線になる事もなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being close to the royal capital, it never became a frontline,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長く改装もされずにいた砦だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and so it had gone without renovations for a long time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However——

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「突撃だぁ！　突撃しろ！　ハハハハハ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Charge! Charge! Hahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「槍兵隊、構えーーーーーッ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Spearmen, ready——!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 好きにやらせるな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't let them do as they please!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二万の魔軍が、ニクラス砦に押し寄せていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Twenty thousand demons were surging against Fort Niklas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五千にも届かない規模のリーザス軍からすれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the Leazas army's perspective, numbering under five thousand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで押し寄せる鉄の壁のようだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they were like an advancing wall of iron.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬるいわぁ！　押し切れ！　ハハハハハ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Too weak! Break through! Hahahahaha!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、弓兵！　敵の足を止めろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn, archers! Stop the enemy's advance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……た、隊長！　野戦では無理ですよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... C-Captain! This is impossible in open battle!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: て、撤退するわけにはいかんのですか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: C-Can we not retreat!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、いかん……！　ここを、放棄しては……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, we must not...! We cannot abandon this position...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （って、こんなボロ砦にこの数の兵士で、って……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (To think this many soldiers are here defending such a shabby fort...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでだよ……！）
「将軍様の命だ！　このまま、この雑魚どもを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's the General's order! Continue like this and defeat these weaklings..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、リーザスの陣の向こうから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, from beyond the Leazas formation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歓声が聞こえた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a cheer was heard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「押し返せ！！　弓兵隊、放てぇぇぇぇぇぇ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Push them back!! Archers, fireeeee!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍！　コルドバ将軍だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "General! It's General Cordoba!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっ、コルドバ将軍！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "G-General Cordoba!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍が直々に、こんな所に！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The General himself, in a place like this!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 青の将コルドバが、直属の少数の兵士と共に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Blue General Cordoba, with his direct small unit of soldiers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場に割って入った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: broke into the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "General!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よく持ちこたえてくれたな、すまん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you for holding out well, I'm sorry!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の動きを察知するのが遅れた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was late in detecting the demon army's movement!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、自分達の務めですから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, it's our duty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全軍！　戦いながら聞けえええええええ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All troops! Listen while fighting!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自らも戦斧を振るって血戦しながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While wielding his battle axe in fierce combat himself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コルドバは周囲を圧する胴間声で叫びを上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cordoba shouted in a commanding voice that overpowered those around him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日だ！　今日だけ、持ちこたえろ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Today! Just today, hold on!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜が明ければ、援軍がやってくる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At dawn, reinforcements will arrive!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺たちの勝ちだ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will win!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「生き残るだけで勲章ものだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just surviving is worthy of a medal!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家族にたっぷり自慢できるぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can boast plenty to your families!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 希望の歓声が上がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A cheer of hope rose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 青の将・コルドバ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Blue General Cordoba.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 防衛戦ではリーザス一を誇る鉄壁の将は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ironclad general who boasts the best defense in Leazas,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 要所を守るのに極めて重要な、士気の上げ方を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: knew better than anyone the importance of raising morale to defend key points.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰よりも心得ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was more knowledgeable than anyone in that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……こ、こいつら……しつこい……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... th-they're persistent...!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Just today, hold on!"},{"lineNumber":25601,"originalJapaneseLine":"　夜が明ければ、援軍がやってくる！","translatedEnglishLine":"At dawn, reinforcements will arrive!"},{"lineNumber":25602,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺たちの勝ちだ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We will win!!\""},{"lineNumber":25603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「生き残るだけで勲章ものだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just surviving is worthy of a medal!"},{"lineNumber":25604,"originalJapaneseLine":"　家族にたっぷり自慢できるぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You can boast plenty to your families!\""},{"lineNumber":25605,"originalJapaneseLine":"希望の歓声が上がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"A cheer of hope rose."},{"lineNumber":25606,"originalJapaneseLine":"青の将・コルドバ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Blue General Cordoba."},{"lineNumber":25607,"originalJapaneseLine":"防衛戦ではリーザス一を誇る鉄壁の将は、","translatedEnglishLine":"The ironclad general who boasts the best defense in Leazas,"},{"lineNumber":25608,"originalJapaneseLine":"要所を守るのに極めて重要な、士気の上げ方を","translatedEnglishLine":"knew better than anyone the importance of raising morale to defend key points."},{"lineNumber":25609,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰よりも心得ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"He was more knowledgeable than anyone in that."},{"lineNumber":25610,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ……こ、こいつら……しつこい……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... th-they're persistent...!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、いいわ。ご苦労さま」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it's fine. Thank you for your efforts."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれは使徒ですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is an Apostle, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最近、要人の暗殺未遂が多発していますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lately, there have been many assassination attempts on important figures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒まで来るとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and for an Apostle to come here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「向こうも本気、ですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They're serious, too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一層用心します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will be even more cautious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、マリス。この娘、余裕があったら直しといて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Maris. If you have time, fix this girl up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアはそう言って、鏡の破片になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lia said that, pointing to the shadow clone shattered into pieces of a mirror.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 影武者を指さした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She pointed at the shadow clone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「方法を調べておきます。……レイラ隊長？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll investigate the method... Captain Layla?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええと、確か……まず、破片を全部集めて…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, if I remember correctly... first, collect all the fragments..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……しかし、ここまで入り込まれる時点で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (…But for them to get this far inside,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 良くないわよね。……ちょっと不利、かな……？）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's not good... we're at a slight disadvantage, aren't we...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは、まだまだ始まったばかりだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle had only just begun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カーソンより、南に半日あまり。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A little more than half a day's travel south of Carson.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに、ニクラス砦という小さな古びた砦があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was a small, old fort called Fort Niklas here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 設備は旧式、規模も小さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The facilities were outdated and the scale was small.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王都にほど近いせいもあり前線になる事もなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being close to the royal capital, it never became a frontline,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長く改装もされずにいた砦だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and so it had gone without renovations for a long time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However——

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「突撃だぁ！　突撃しろ！　ハハハハハ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Charge! Charge! Hahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「槍兵隊、構えーーーーーッ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Spearmen, ready——!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 好きにやらせるな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't let them do as they please!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二万の魔軍が、ニクラス砦に押し寄せていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Twenty thousand demons were surging against Fort Niklas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五千にも届かない規模のリーザス軍からすれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the Leazas army's perspective, numbering under five thousand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで押し寄せる鉄の壁のようだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they were like an advancing wall of iron.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬるいわぁ！　押し切れ！　ハハハハハ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Too weak! Break through! Hahahahaha!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、弓兵！　敵の足を止めろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn, archers! Stop the enemy's advance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……た、隊長！　野戦では無理ですよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... C-Captain! This is impossible in open battle!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: て、撤退するわけにはいかんのですか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: C-Can we not retreat!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、いかん……！　ここを、放棄しては……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, we must not...! We cannot abandon this position...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （って、こんなボロ砦にこの数の兵士で、って……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (To think this many soldiers are here defending such a shabby fort...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでだよ……！）
「将軍様の命だ！　このまま、この雑魚どもを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's the General's order! Continue like this and defeat these weaklings..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、リーザスの陣の向こうから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, from beyond the Leazas formation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歓声が聞こえた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a cheer was heard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「押し返せ！！　弓兵隊、放てぇぇぇぇぇぇ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Push them back!! Archers, fireeeee!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍！　コルドバ将軍だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "General! It's General Cordoba!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっ、コルドバ将軍！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "G-General Cordoba!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍が直々に、こんな所に！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The General himself, in a place like this!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 青の将コルドバが、直属の少数の兵士と共に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Blue General Cordoba, with his direct small unit of soldiers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場に割って入った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: broke into the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "General!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よく持ちこたえてくれたな、すまん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you for holding out well, I'm sorry!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の動きを察知するのが遅れた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was late in detecting the demon army's movement!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、自分達の務めですから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, it's our duty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全軍！　戦いながら聞けえええええええ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All troops! Listen while fighting!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自らも戦斧を振るって血戦しながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While wielding his battle axe in fierce combat himself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コルドバは周囲を圧する胴間声で叫びを上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cordoba shouted in a commanding voice that overpowered those around him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日だ！　今日だけ、持ちこたえろ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Today! Just today, hold on!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜が明ければ、援軍がやってくる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At dawn, reinforcements will arrive!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺たちの勝ちだ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will win!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「生き残るだけで勲章ものだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just surviving is worthy of a medal!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家族にたっぷり自慢できるぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can boast plenty to your families!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 希望の歓声が上がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A cheer of hope rose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 青の将・コルドバ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Blue General Cordoba.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 防衛戦ではリーザス一を誇る鉄壁の将は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ironclad general who boasts the best defense in Leazas,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 要所を守るのに極めて重要な、士気の上げ方を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: knew better than anyone the importance of raising morale to defend key points.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰よりも心得ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was more knowledgeable than anyone in that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……こ、こいつら……しつこい……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... th-they're persistent...!"
